text: for me social enterprise is about the
double bottom line the idea that a
company can do well for investors or
shareholders while also having
a benefit for society more broadly to me
social enterprise is about innovative
ways to create value for society through
business models you mix financial
returns with social impact the rules of
the game for us going forward um are
going to be different you know a lot of
a lot of the methods that we've used in
the past
there are altruistic methods but they're
not effective methods and so i think
social enterprise is taking some of the
business sense and some of the practices
from private some private businesses and
corporations and for-profit institutions
and applying them in a way that we
create lasting and deep impact in in
nations and and communities that really
need them maybe not every company will
have a social mission but i think that
there are externalities that exist in
the world that companies need to be more
aware of social enterprise i think is is
the best way to make a difference in the
world and so i think it's integral to
hbs's mission and to our personal
missions
